column2:
"...Ah, great job.
It looks like it was a thorough cleanout."

"Though they came in swarms and
groups, you have cleanly wiped them
all out."

"It's good that the base has become
cleaned. Well, it's also a short-lived
peace anyway."

"I think that soon it's necessary to clean
up the mess again so I’ll depend on
you again when the time comes."

"……ああ、おつかれさん。
しっかり片付けたみたいだね。"

"ウジャウジャと群れてたけど
きれいさっぱり消え失せたね。"

"基地もきれいになってよかっただろ。
ま、つかの間の平和ってやつだね。"

"直ぐに掃除が必要になるとは思うけど
その時は宜しく頼んだよ。"
